sentences.sContent: She enjoined me strictly not to tell anyone else.
sentences.sCn: 她严令我不要告诉其他任何人。
伊斯兰教告诫人们要宽容。

remMethod.val: en(使) + join(参加) → 使(别人)参加 → 命令

trans.tranCn: 吩咐, 命令, 嘱咐, <主美>禁止
trans.tranOther: If you enjoin someone to do something, you order them to do it. If you enjoin an action or attitude, you order people to do it or have it.
